name: Scuff Saber
description:
Ok this may look like a five year old just wacked there keyboard for a while but this was a small project to see how quick it took to make a (Kind of) functional game. This took me around 5 hours and I am kinda regretting my life choices.

You Will Need a Controller to play this (No Keyboard Support) and good luck because you will need it XD

I might take this further but for now this is it :)
